thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Cynthia Caballero

author: Cynthia Caballero
title: Cynthia Caballero
text:
My company purchased 2 types of USB from Flashbay. We ordered the key and mini clip USB from Mike who was our sales representative. He assisted us through the entire process. We gave him the company logo, and he was able to provide us rapidly with proofs that his graphic techs made. We placed our order with Mike which was genuinely amazing. He was very nice and knowledgeable of the company products. We were very pleased with the level of service that he provided because it was impeccable.
We will definitely be reordering from Flashbay in the future because the final product was very impressive and it even arrived a day earlier than anticipated.
